description:
Ko-o tries to kill Yoko out of jealousy, and that makes his Kirin, Korin, sick.  Korin chooses death by disobeying Ko-o’s order to kill Yoko.  That makes Yoko decide to get Keiki back from Kei’s fake queen, Joei.  Yoko’s still not sure whether to be Kei’s queen or go home, but Rakushun gives her good advice.  With En-o’s help, Yoko breaks Keiki’s seal, accepts him as her Kirin, rules Kei Kingom and takes the throne.  Keiki causes the Shoku for Sugimoto to go home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cień Księżyca, Morze Cienia – Rozdział końcowy
Shadow of the Moon, The Sea of Shadow - Last Chapter
Tsuki no Kage, Kage no Umi - Shuushou
Тень Луны, Море Тени. Часть последняя
月の影 影の海 終章
